page.title: 06Growing Leeks
page.content: WHEN YOU GROW LEEKS YOU SHOULD KEEP THEM IN A GREENHOUSE FOR FIVE MONTHS BEFORE YOU CAN PLANT THEM.THE TRENCH HAS TO BE LEFT OVER WINTER BEFORE YOU PLANT THE LEEKS.AFTER YOU HAVE PLANTED THE LEEKS YOU HAVE TO WATER THEM EVERY DAY UNTIL OCTOBER.WHEN IT IS OCTOBER YOU TAKE YOUR LEEKS OUT OF THE TRENCH AND YOU HAVE TO WASH YOUR LEEKS BEFORE ENTERING THE LEEK SHOW.IN A LEEK SHOW THEY JUDGE THE BEST CARROTS, ONIONS,CAULIFLOWERS AND CABBAGES AS WELL AS THE BEST LEEK.THE ONE WHO WINS THE LEEK SHOW GETS SOME MONEY AND SOME PRIZES.THE MAIN THINGS TO DO IS HAVE AND OLD LEEK IN THE GARDEN BECAUSE THAT IS WHERE YOU GET THE YOUNG LEEKS FROM.YOU HAVE TO KEEP AN EYE ON THEM BECAUSE PEOPLE TRY TO DESTROY THEM TO PREVENT YOU FROM WINNING THE PRIZE. KENNETH BYRNE
